description:
Madao is divine guardian spirit, created when a "http://anidb.net/ch1655 [fly]" joined the Guardian Fusion between http://anidb.net/ch96889 [Asuraman] and http://anidb.net/ch96890 [Alchu]. Currently unemployed.
Since Hasegawa Taizou was a guardian spirit of his own shades, his "powers" merged with the ones other two had before fusion, meaning that current merger is an unemployed alcoholic that can only communicate with a whiteboard.
name: Madao
